+.» So the entire oasis sank into the desert. I said that’s it, I’m done with Egypt. It’s off to the Orient to follow my true dream. And when that didn’t work out, I opened this nightclub. He raises his champagne flute in a toast.

Jonathan!

Don’t blame me, he’s your son, it’s not like you two have been role models for playing it safe. O’ CONNELL Where is he?  28. As Jonathan points upstairs and they head away, CAMERA FI Major Suki observing from a booth. OFF his face... INT. ALEX’S APARTMENT - NIGHT There’s a KNOCK at the door. Oh that. It was a gift from the British Consulate, apparently my discovery has been a big morale boost to everybody back home. Mum, you look upset.

I can explain.

Alex, I’m going. You obviously have some catching up to do. Good night, Mr. and Mrs. 0’Connell.
Lily, wait. As she heads out, Alex turns to his parents, exasperated.
Way to go guys, thanks. OQ’ CONNELL Let me get this straight. You lie to us and we’re supposed to feel bad about ruining your date?

It wasn’t a -~ (catches himself) I didn’t tell you about the dig because I knew what you’d say. That you don’t want me running around a country on the brink of war. 0’ CONNELL Yeah, we're terrible parents holding you back like that.
You parked me at Yale because you still think I’m a child. 0’ CONNELL We parked you at Yale so you’d live to see your next birthday.  31.

When Six Willoughby called and said I could be of service to my country, I jumped. (to Evy, excited) Mum, he’s going to make me a full Bembridge Scholar. 0’ CONNELL That doesn’t matter. But Evy’s face suddenly glows with pride.
Full scholar? Alex, that’s fantastic. Just what we’ve always dreamed about.
Sir Willoughby is throwing me a party at the British Consulate tomorrow night. . O’ CONNELL Evy, we’re supposed to be mad. United front, remember?
Alex, it’s terrible you lied... (can’t contain herself) ... but congratulations! Give me a hug. As they hug, Rick rolls his eyes. Evy finally breaks off.

If I could borrow Alex for a moment, the Dean of the University would like to meet him. As Alex heads away with Lily.

Still incorrigible.
Hello, Evelyn. Flustered, they turn and find Sir Colin Willoughby.
Rick. 0’ CONNELL Colin.

Who better to find a mummy than an O’Connell... (turning to Evy) ... and who better to raise one than you, Evelyn. Another firework blossoms. Rick and Evy stare in shock as Okumura holds up Zohora’s TERRA COTTA BOOK OF THE DEAD.

I implore you if the Emperor rises, he’1l...
